experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.description: Developed end-to-end RAG pipelines for testing, with a strong emphasis on AI-generated output metrics for evaluation. Designed and built a complete evaluation pipeline for RAG models, including custom test data generation and explainability techniques. Led the development of a robust road scenario object detection system using YOLO and OpenCV, achieving 85% precision and 87% recall in real time.

experiences.title: Manual Tester
experiences.description: Conducted comprehensive testing of live cryptocurrency platforms, including Tarality and BitBharat. Evaluated the Exobe marketplace project, ensuring quality and performance standards were met.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Intern
experiences.description: Provided crucial support on live projects, applying machine learning and deep learning expertise to develop cutting-edge solutions. Gained hands-on experience in implementing ML models for real-world applications.
